meanings.sent1: After watching the movie, she refeels the excitement.
meanings.sent2: Every time he visits the park, he refeels the joy of his childhood.
meanings.sent3: When she sees her favorite painting, she refeels the happiness all over again.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song makes him refeels the nostalgia of his youth.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies baking in the oven makes her refeels the warmth of home.

meanings.definition: To experience emotions or sensations again.
meanings.sent1: Listening to the song makes her refeels the sadness of the breakup.
meanings.sent2: Every time he reads the letter, he refeels the love he felt that day.
meanings.sent3: Seeing the old photo album makes her refeels the nostalgia for the past.
meanings.sent4: The smell of rain makes him refeels the calmness of a peaceful day.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the cake makes her refeels the joy of celebrations.

meanings.definition: To have a renewed emotional response.
meanings.sent1: When he sees the sunset, he refeels the awe of nature.
meanings.sent2: Every time she hears the song, she refeels the excitement of the concert.
meanings.sent3: Watching the movie again makes him refeels the suspense of the plot.
meanings.sent4: The smell of fresh flowers makes her refeels the beauty of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the dish makes him refeels the deliciousness of the meal.
